title: Moonrider Outpost
textc: Immediate: Spend 8 progress. Burn threat and +2 Food dice.

title: Mana Drain
texta: Effect: No characters may channel mana for remainder of season.
textc: Immediate: Spend 7 progress. Burn threat and +1 mana die.

title: Hindrance: 1
textb: (GANG) -1 Food die or +4 Discord. Defense: Combat. If in staging area, move to occupied spotlight location.
